.music

{#
Rocksteady Reggae

Hard to be true

I've had the pleasure to write, perform and co-produce this album. The Dell-hi’s is a rocksteady trio inspired by traditional Jamaican music of the 1960s and 1970s. In their debut EP So Follows The Dance, The Dell-Hi’s sing a message of love, life and truth in warm 3-part harmony backed by some of Brooklyn’s top rocksteady and reggae musicians. So Follows The Dance is a celebration of the sounds and rhythms of traditional rocksteady music that fill your hearts and move your feet. Listen to us now on Spotify

#}
Mobile application

Music for mobile applications and gaming

I've had the opportunity to create original music for children's TV shows, games and learning applications. It has always been a fun experience capturing the best mood and music for the experience.

Jazz

MQ

This is a number I composed for the album Bamboo by Eastside Combo, a Latin-jazz group I performed and recorded with in Orlando, FL. Kevin Stevers on bass, Derrick Harvin on keys, Willis Rast on drums and yours truly on tenor saxophone.

{#
Word Wold

Shiny gift

I composed this number for PBS's Word World. The influence was a combination of Leonard Bernstein's Something's Coming and Danny Elfman's Theme from Edward Scissorhands. The final recording was produced by the skilled Nathaniel Reichman

#}
